text: Flaminio Bottoni (born 4 August 1881, date of death unknown) was an Italian gymnast. He competed in the men's team event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1881 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Flaminio Bottoni
